name: Шампунь Schauma Men Ultra сила для ежедневного применения 360мл
ingredients: aqua (water, eau), sodium laureth sulfate, sodium chloride, cocamidopropyl betaine, humulus lupulus (hops) cone extract, coco-glucoside, caprylyl/capryl glucoside, peg-7 glyceryl cocoate, glycol distearate, parfum (fragrance), citric acid, laureth-4,  polyquaternium-10, hydrogenated castor oil, peg-40 hydrogenated castor oil, propylene glycol, sodium benzoate, hexyl cinnamal, linalool, limonene
